name: cbp-e2e-tests
description: This is the end to end testing framework for cbp domains

scripts.test-local-e1-integration: npm run gherkin-lint && npm run es-lint && npm run conf-e1 -- --runOnSauce=false --suite=createPaymentIntegrationTests
scripts.test-local-e1: npm run gherkin-lint && npm run es-lint && npm run conf-e1 -- --runOnSauce=false --suite=createPaymentTests
scripts.test-local-e2: npm run gherkin-lint && npm run es-lint && npm run conf-e2 -- --runOnSauce=false --suite=createPaymentTests
scripts.test-jenkins-e1: npm run gherkin-lint && npm run es-lint && npm run conf-e1 -- --runOnSauce=true
scripts.test-jenkins-e2: npm run gherkin-lint && npm run es-lint && npm run conf-e2 -- --runOnSauce=true
scripts.test-local-fis-e0: npm run gherkin-lint && npm run es-lint && npm run conf-fis-e0 -- --runOnSauce=false --suite=fisSierraConfigurationTests
scripts.test-local-fis-e1: npm run gherkin-lint && npm run es-lint && npm run conf-fis-e1 -- --runOnSauce=false --suite=fisSierraConfigurationTests
scripts.test-local-fis-e2: npm run gherkin-lint && npm run es-lint && npm run conf-fis-e2 -- --runOnSauce=false --suite=fisSierraConfigurationTests
scripts.test-jenkins-fise1: npm run gherkin-lint && npm run es-lint && npm run conf-fis-e1 -- --runOnSauce=true
scripts.test-jenkins-fise2: npm run gherkin-lint && npm run es-lint && npm run conf-fis-e2 -- --runOnSauce=true

author: cbp-qa@aexp.com
